org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api

Interface DeviceFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceFactoryBase, DeviceFactoryImpl

    public interface DeviceFactory
    This class represent the main interface for the extendable architecture of the refinement driver. Each refinement driver from ZigBeeEndpoint to Device has to implement this interface as OSGi Service and register it on OSGi platform.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceId

        int getDeviceId()
        Returns:
        return the String representing the Device Id that this driver can refine

      • getDeviceClusters

        int[] getDeviceClusters()
        Returns:
        return an array of String containing all the cluster interfaces
        implemented by the refined device generated by this driver

      • getRefinedInterfaces

        java.lang.String[] getRefinedInterfaces()
        Returns:
        return an array of String containing all the interfaces
        implemented by the refined device generated by this driver

      • getInstance

        DeviceBase getInstance(ZigBeeEndpoint zbd)
        Parameters:
        zbd - the ZigBeeEndpoint to refine
        Returns:
        the DeviceBase refined from ZigBeeEndpoint from this
        refinement driver
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException
